title: AVESCOIN
author: AVESCOIN
content: AVES coin restores the availability of the previous version of ETHEREUM to the mining market and in doing so stimulates and finances green energy projects. We designed a system in that our blockchain saves 5% of each block to a publicly announced address and from which funds will be distributed to innovators of alternative energy sources. This will be done through legal community voting and published through the media.https://avescoin.iohttps://ico.avescoin.io

comments.author: FreeWorldUsers
comments.body: SCAM ALERT! 1. They run Ico and you was able to buy already coins 2. I jump on their pool 3. They reset whole chain even if network explorer says its mainnet and explain is a testnet so you was already able to buy ICO coins on test net chain     4. Be aware of future restarts maybe its again testnet5. Kids playing with code6. They banned me just after I said about it 100 % pure scam project

comments.author: tonidev
comments.body: Quote from: FreeWorldUsers on December 02, 2022, 09:17:59 PMSCAM ALERT! 1. They run Ico and you was able to buy already coins 2. I jump on their pool 3. They reset whole chain even if network explorer says its mainnet and explain is a testnet so you was already able to buy ICO coins on test net chain     4. Be aware of future restarts maybe its again testnet5. Kids playing with code6. They banned me just after I said about it 100 % pure scam project Project is currently on the testnet until 15.12.2022, we are testing our explorer and our blockchain that is like few hours old.He found our private pool so we needed to ban him from using our pool.We are an company and team of professionals and in final stages of testing's.ICO page is still in the testing phase, please when you post on here do some research You are not able to buy our coins until 15.12.2022

comments.author: AVESCOIN
comments.created_time: December 02, 2022, 10:13:25 PMLast edit: December 02, 2022, 11:30:50 PM by AVESCOIN
comments.body: Dear customer and mining enthusiast.Ico offers starting on Dec 15, 2022, which we will be presented to the public abroad across all available media. It's true we have a pool for mining and his purpose is to test the stability of the chain and etc. Also, any user who connects to a fresh unpublished pool with over 6ghs power is potential 51% attacker, so we are forced to act. I just politely ask you not to spread false information with a freshly created account. Our project is under a legal software company and you making business damage to our company and crew. So, I ask myself what is the motive for someone to spend mining power more than 6ghs in hours? maybe the intention is to break the project in beginning or to rewrite the whole chain. Regards and let decentralisation live!

comments.author: AVESCOIN
comments.body: Quote from: MMOStars on December 04, 2022, 05:47:48 PMSame concept as rugged PINKCHAIN. Honestly, I didn't know about that project but seems not bad. Thanks for info
